name.ja: ムーンフォース・リフェット

requirement.en: You have 4 or less monsters in your Graveyard.

effect.en: Send the top 2 cards of your opponent's Deck to the Graveyard. Then, if your opponent has 5 or more Monster Cards in their Graveyard, and you have not drawn a card during this Main Phase, you can draw 2 cards. You cannot activate monster effects until the end of this turn, except those of EARTH Attribute Galaxy Type monsters.
